description:
Combine this canyon with a hike to Island Lake, one of Colorado's premier hiking destinations, which is only 120ft more elevation gain and 1/2 mile further. Can be combined with Middle Ice Lake Creek and also with Lower Ice Lake Creek for a more substantial canyon day. The views are breathtaking. The R rating is for the entrapment possibility on the second rappel (the big one where you get blasted in a narrow shaft). On the lower 25 feet there is a gap on canyon left that is hardly visible, wide enough for a pack or limb to get caught. This is in substantial flow and rescue would need to be immediate.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background
name: Ice Lake Creek (Upper)
